title: W3C Math Working Group-relevant MDN issues
description: Issue filed on MDN Web Docs related to pages attached to technologies developed by W3C Math Working Group

items.content_html:
MDN URL

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/MathML/Element/mtd

What specific section or headline is this issue about?

Attributes

What information was incorrect, unhelpful, or incomplete?

According to https://w3c.github.io/mathml-core/#mtd-attributes columnspan is now called colspan in MathML Core.
In the documentation of MDN only columnspan is mentioned.

What did you expect to see?

I am not sure. Should both attributes be mentioned?

Do you have any supporting links, references, or citations?

https://w3c.github.io/mathml-core/#mtd-attributes

The name of the column spanning attribute in [[MathML3]] and earlier versions was columnspan. For consistency with [[HTML]], this specification uses colspan instead.

Do you have anything more you want to share?

No browser seems to support colspan on mtd from my quick testing

MDN metadata

Page report details

  • MDN URL: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/MathML/Element/mtd

items.title: [mathml-core] MathML Core seems to have renamed columnspan to colspan in MathML mtd-element
